citances.sentence: 40 An application by the appellant to the Federal Magistrates Court for constitutional writ relief was dismissed. However, an appeal from that decision was upheld by Rares J on 15 August 2007. He made an order quashing the decision of the second Tribunal member of 27 November 2006 and granted relief in the nature of mandamus directing the Tribunal to hear and determine the application for review lodged 14 September 2004 according to law (see SZHBP v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2007] FCA 1226 ; (2007) 97 ALD 84).
